vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.22.22;
son of: Nahor (H5152H) and Milcah (H4435);
brother of: Uz (H5780H), Buz (H0938), Kemuel (H7055), Chesed (H3777), Hazo (H2375), Pildash (H6394), Jidlaph (H3044) and Tebah (H2875);
half-brother of: Gaham (H1514), Tahash (H8477) and Maacah (H4601);
father of: Rebekah (H7259) and Laban (H3837A)
§ Bethuel = "God destroys" or "man of God" or "dweller in God"
n pr m
nephew of Abraham, son of Nahor by Milcah, father of Rebekah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Nahor; padre de Labán; (b) בְּתוּל   ciudad; territorio de Simeón
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
彼土利 这个字在原文的意思是 "神毀壞" 或 "屬神的人"
陽性專有名詞
1) 亞伯拉罕的姪子, 拿鶴和妻子密迦的兒子, 利百加的父親
專有名詞 地名
2) 在西緬南方的一個城鎮 (代上 4:30)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
彼土利 这个字在原文的意思是 "神毁坏" 或 "属神的人"
阳性专有名词
1) 亚伯拉罕的侄子, 拿鹤和妻子密迦的儿子, 利百加的父亲
专有名词 地名
2) 在西缅南方的一个城镇 (代上 4:30)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Bethuel = "God destroys" or "man of God" or "dweller in God"
n pr loc
a town of Simeon in the south
